00022 /**
00023  * @file   PmAdjuster.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:16:57 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Interface for determining a change based on intensity of perfect match
00028  * probe.
00029  */
00030 #ifndef _PMADJUSTER_H_
00031 #define _PMADJUSTER_H_
00032 
00033 //
00034 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/IntensityMart.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/IntensityTransformer.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/SelfCreate.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/SelfDoc.h"
00039 //
00040 #include <vector>
00041 
00042 /**
00043  *  Interface for determining a change based on intensity of perfect match
00044  */
00045 class PmAdjuster : public SelfDoc, public SelfCreate {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049   /** 
00050    * @brief Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00051    */
00052   virtual ~PmAdjuster() {};
00053 
00054   /** 
00055    * @brief Function to determine how much to adjust a perfect match intensity.
00056    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00057    * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00058    * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00059    * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00060    * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00061    * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00062    * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00063    */
00064   virtual void pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx, 
00065                             const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00066                             float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust) = 0;
00067 
00068   /** 
00069    * Subset of probes that should are needed for estimating parameters.
00070    * @param probes - bitmask of probes to be set.
00071    */
00072   virtual void setProbes(std::vector<bool> &probes) {};
00073 
00074   /** 
00075    * @brief What is the name of the adjuster?
00076    * @return name of adjuster.
00077    */  
00078   std::string getType() { return m_Type;}
00079 
00080   /**
00081    * Custom configuration for this PmAdjuster
00082    */
00083   virtual void setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00084     Err::errAbort("setParameters() is not supported in class: " + getDocName());
00085   }
00086 
00087 protected:
00088   /// String description of adjuster
00089   std::string m_Type;
00090 };
00091 
00092 #endif /* _PMADJUSTER_H_ */
